mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET EMP_PICTURE = #{emp_Picture} WHERE EMP_ID = #{emp_Id}
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_title,code_id,schedule_imp FROM ( SELECT schedule_title,code_id,schedule_imp,schedule_start_dt FROM SCHEDULE WHERE (TO_DATE(#{schedule_Start_Dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TRUNC(SCHEDULE_START_DT) AND TRUNC(SCHEDULE_END_DT)) AND SCHEDULE_ST = 1 AND SCHEDULE_WRITER_ID = #{empId} AND CODE_ID = 'S01' AND ROWNUM <= 2 UNION ALL SELECT a.schedule_title,a.code_id,a.schedule_imp,a.schedule_start_dt FROM SCHEDULE a left outer join dept b on b.DEPT_SUP_ID = A.DEPT_ID WHERE (TO_DATE(#{schedule_Start_Dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TRUNC(SCHEDULE_START_DT) AND TRUNC(SCHEDULE_END_DT)) AND SCHEDULE_ST = 1 AND b.dept_id= #{deptId} AND CODE_ID = 'S02' AND ROWNUM <= 2 UNION ALL SELECT schedule_title,code_id,schedule_imp,schedule_start_dt FROM SCHEDULE WHERE (TO_DATE(#{schedule_Start_Dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TRUNC(SCHEDULE_START_DT) AND TRUNC(SCHEDULE_END_DT)) AND SCHEDULE_ST = 1 AND DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND CODE_ID = 'S03' AND ROWNUM <= 2 ) ORDER BY SCHEDULE_START_DT

select * from( select a.meet_room_reservation_id, a.meet_room_id, a.emp_id, a.reservation_start_time, a.reservation_end_time, a.reservation_date, a.meet_room_detail, a.meet_room_reservation_st, '' as meet_room_dept_id, b.meet_room_name, b.meet_room_no from MEET_ROOM_RESERVATION a left outer join meet_room b on a.meet_room_id = b.meet_room_id where a.RESERVATION_DATE = #{schedule_Start_Dt} and a.emp_id = #{empId} AND ROWNUM <= 2 UNION ALL select a.*, b.meet_room_name, b.meet_room_no from MEET_ROOM_RESERVATION a left outer join meet_room b on a.meet_room_id = b.meet_room_id where RESERVATION_DATE = #{schedule_Start_Dt} and meet_room_dept_id = #{deptId} and not emp_id = #{empId} AND ROWNUM <= 2 )
mapper.update: UPDATE DASHBOARD SET dashboard_approval = #{dashboardApproval}, dashboard_reservation = #{dashboardReservation}, dashboard_issue = #{dashboardIssue}, dashboard_duty = #{dashboardDuty}, dashboard_project = #{dashboardProject}, dashboard_board = #{dashboardBoard}, dashboard_weather = #{dashboardWeather} WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
